page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: I am Damian Stobbart aged 10 years. Every Saturday morning I get out of bed at half past six, then I go downstairs to have my breakfast. After my breakfast I get dressed and watch a bit of T.V. I go out to the playing field with my brother. When we both get bored we go back home and get our wellingtons on,ready to go to the farm shop in our van to get some shopping.Returning home we play football with Dad while Mum makes the dinner.We usually have beefburgers, chips, and beans; it's very good. Then we watch "The Grumble weeds Radio Show", "The Price is Right" then a film called "Hunter". We go to bed at 10 o'clock.
